DOC.brief_summary: To determine maximum tolerate dose , safety , pharmacokinetics anti-tumour efficacy oral BIBW 2992 combination intravenous oral vinorelbine
DOC.brief_title: Afatinib Vinorelbine Tumours Known Overexpress EGFR and/or HER2
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Histologically cytologically confirm diagnosis malignancy advance , non resectable and/or metastatic Tumours historically know overexpress EGFR and/or HER2 Exclusion criterion : Prior treatment HER2 inhibiting drug within past 4 week start therapy concomitantly trial . Prior treatment EGFR inhibiting drug within past two week start therapy concomitantly trial .
